i1.name: Blaze
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Brand's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Ablaze'' to enemies hit that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Subsequent abilities used against a target with ''Ablaze'' are empowered. Killing an enemy afflicted with ''Ablaze'' or with an ability restores {{as|{{pp|20 to 40 for 7|1;3 to 18}} {{sti|mana}}}}.

{{sbc|Ablaze:}} While afflicted with ''Ablaze'', the target is dealt{{ft|{{as|{{fd|2.5}}% of their '''maximum''' health}} over {{fd|3.25}} seconds|{{as|{{fd|0.8{{Recurring|3}}}}% of their '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|1.08{{recurring|3}}}} seconds over {{fd|3.25}} seconds}}as {{as|magic damage}}. ''Ablaze'' deals 120% damage per tick to {{tip|monsters}}, capped at 80.

Upon applying 3 stacks of ''Ablaze'' to a large {{tip|monster}} or enemy {{tip|champion}}, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants {{tip|sight}} and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt {{as|{{pp|key=%|9 to 13 for 17|1 to 17}} of their '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} as {{as|magic damage}} and applied a stack of ''Ablaze''. ''The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.''
'''Brand''' cannot stack ''Ablaze'' more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Brand's champion ability apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Subsequent abilities used against a target with Ablaze are empowered. Killing an enemy afflicted with Ablaze or with an ability restores 1;3 to 18 ‒ undefined mana.
Ablaze: While afflicted with Ablaze, the target is dealtas magic damage. Ablaze deals 120% damage per tick to monsters, capped at 80.
Upon applying 3 stacks of Ablaze to a large monster or enemy champion, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants sight and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt 1 to 17 ‒ undefined of their maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) as magic damage and applied a stack of Ablaze. The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.
Brand cannot stack Ablaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.
i1.notes:
* ''Ablaze'' is a debuff that persists through [[death]].
* The explosion is not considered a tether effect and will not affect {{tip|untargetable}} targets, even if the explosion originated from them.
* Each stack deals the damage individually and will always consider the time it was applied for deciding when the ticks will be applied, even when the duration refreshes.
** At sub-optimal applied times, 2 stacks will deal a minimum of {{as|6% '''maximum''' health}} damage over 4 seconds, but will deal {{as|7% '''maximum''' health}} at optimal applied times.
** Against small-medium units 3 stacks will deal a minimum of {{as|9% '''maximum''' health}} at sub-optimal times, but {{as|11% '''maximum''' health}} at optimal times. If these stacks are further {{tt|refreshed|By ablazing a target that's already at 3 stacks}} at optimal times they can deal up to {{as|12% '''maximum''' health}} over 4 seconds.
* The burn is {{tip|persistent damage}} and the explosion is {{tip|area damage}}.

q1.name: Sear
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' launches a fireball in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit.
{{sbc|{{ai|Blaze|Brand|Ablaze}} Bonus:}} The target is {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
Brand's Ablaze Bonus: The target is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

w1.name: Pillar_of_Flame
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{rutngt|0.625}} delay, '''Brand''' erupts a pillar of flame at the target location that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: After a 0.627 delay, Brand erupts a pillar of flame at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
Brand's Ablaze Bonus: The target takes 25% bonus damage.
w1.notes: * The delay before the eruption does not include the cast time. The delay would be a total of {{rutngt|0.889}} if it included the cast time.

e1.name: Conflagration
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' sets the target enemy aflame, which creates a blast that deals {{as|magic damage}} to them and nearby enemies.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, which creates a blast that deals magic damage to them and nearby enemies.
Brand's Ablaze Bonus: Conflagration spreads farther.

r1.name: Pyroclasm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and '''Brand''' up to four times, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies each time.

If ''Pyroclasm's'' current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to '''Brand''' even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.
''Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then '''Brand'''.''
''The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
{{sbc|{{ai|Blaze|Brand|Ablaze}} Bonus:}} The target is {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.
If Pyroclasm's current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to Brand even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.
Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then Brand.
The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having sight of them or not.
Brand's Ablaze Bonus: The target is slowed for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 300*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The fireball may only bounce to valid targets, including '''Brand'''.
* The fireball does not grant {{tip|sight}} of {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} enemies and those in fog of war but it can expose their position.
* If the initial cast target uses {{tip|spell shield}}, ''Pyroclasm'' will not bounce. If the bounce is blocked by an enemy's ''spell shield'' it will not deal any damage, but it will keep on bouncing.
